item.title: five women brutally murdered in mexico beach resort
item.description: five women, all apparently connected to a beauty parlor, were found brutally murdered in the mexican beach resort of acapulco on saturday morning, state police said.

item.title: ncaa tournament delivers highest tv ratings in 20 years

item.title: many u.s. employers to drop health benefits: mckinsey
